## Why Open Science?  

::: {.fragment .fade-in fragment-index=1}
*  Standardized workflows and efficiency  
::: 

::: {.fragment .fade-in fragment-index=2}
*  Improve and support collaboration  
::: 

::: {.fragment .fade-in fragment-index=3}
*  Ensure our science is truly reproducible  
::: 

::: {.fragment .fade-in fragment-index=4}
*  Provide tools for sharing and communicating our work
::: 

## Topics we will cover 

::: {.fragment .fade-in fragment-index=1}
*  Codespaces, and reproducible R environments
::: 

::: {.fragment .fade-in fragment-index=2}
*  Transparent Assessment Framework ([TAF](https://www.ices.dk/data/assessment-tools/Pages/transparent-assessment-framework.aspx))
::: 

::: {.fragment .fade-in fragment-index=3}
*  Reproducible workflows using software containers
::: 

::: {.fragment .fade-in fragment-index=4}
*  Creating reproducible reports and presentations
::: 

::: {.fragment .fade-in fragment-index=5}
*  Creating websites to share results 
:::
